segments.text: That poor woman has no idea about the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's running over, puddle spreading fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying the plate so meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids behind her are in danger on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's reaching high into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It could tip and he'd fall hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting eagerly, not seeing the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor's slippery now from the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone could slip and get hurt badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so safe and serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It breaks my heart thinking of an accident here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are open, cookies spilling out maybe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic bliss is hanging by a thread.
segments.speaker: PAR
